info.title: Open Data Hub Content Api
info.description: Open Data Hub Content Api based on .Net Core with PostgreSQL

get.summary: GET Generic Deprecated search of fields

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Pagenumber

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Elements per Page, (default:10)

parameters.name: odhtype
parameters.description: Mandatory search trough Entities (metadata, accommodation, odhactivitypoi, event, webcam, measuringpoint, ltsactivity, ltspoi, ltsgastronomy, article ..... null = search trough all entities)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Mandatory search trough Entities (metadata, accommodation, odhactivitypoi, event, webcam, measuringpoint, ltsactivity, ltspoi, ltsgastronomy, article ..... null = search trough all entities)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Mandatory Select a field for the Distinct Query, example fields=Source, arrays are selected with a [*] example HasLanguage[*] / Features[*].Id (Only one field supported). Wiki fields

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting, (default:null)

parameters.name: rawfilter
parameters.description: Wiki rawfilter

parameters.name: rawsort
parameters.description: Wiki rawsort

parameters.name: getasarray
parameters.description: Get only first selected field as simple string Array

parameters.name: excludenulloremptyvalues
parameters.description: Exclude empty and null values from output

get.summary: GET Generic Distinct search of fields

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Pagenumber

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Elements per Page, (default:10)

parameters.name: odhtype
parameters.description: Mandatory search trough Entities (metadata, accommodation, odhactivitypoi, event, webcam, measuringpoint, ltsactivity, ltspoi, ltsgastronomy, article ..... )

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Mandatory search trough Entities (metadata, accommodation, odhactivitypoi, event, webcam, measuringpoint, ltsactivity, ltspoi, ltsgastronomy, article ..... )

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Mandatory Select a field for the Distinct Query, example fields=Source, arrays are selected with a [*] example HasLanguage[*] / Features[*].Id (Only one field supported). Wiki fields

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting, (default:null)

parameters.name: rawfilter
parameters.description: Wiki rawfilter

parameters.name: rawsort
parameters.description: Wiki rawsort

parameters.name: getasarray
parameters.description: Get only first selected field as simple string Array

parameters.name: excludenulloremptyvalues
parameters.description: Exclude empty and null values from output

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language field selector, displays data and fields in the selected language (default:'null' all languages are displayed)

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Pagenumber

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Elements per Page, (default:10)

parameters.name: exampletype
parameters.description: Example Types Filter (Separator ',' List of ExampleTypes IDs), (default:'null')

parameters.name: idlist
parameters.description: IDFilter (Separator ',' List of IDs), (default:'null')

parameters.name: langfilter
parameters.description: Language filter (returns only data available in the selected Language, Separator ',' possible values: 'de,it,en,nl,sc,pl,fr,ru', 'null': Filter disabled)

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Active Filter (possible Values: 'true' only Active Data, 'false' only Disabled Data), (default:'null')

parameters.name: updatefrom
parameters.description: Returns data changed after this date Format (yyyy-MM-dd), (default: 'null')

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting, (default:null)

parameters.name: publishedon
parameters.description: Published On Filter (Separator ',' List of publisher IDs), (default:'null')

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter by Source (Separator ','), (Sources available 'idm','noi'...),(default: 'null')

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to display, More fields are indicated by separator ',' example fields=Id,Active,Shortname (default:'null' all fields are displayed). Wiki fields

parameters.name: searchfilter
parameters.description: String to search for, Title in all languages are searched, (default: null) Wiki searchfilter

parameters.name: rawfilter
parameters.description: Wiki rawfilter

parameters.name: rawsort
parameters.description: Wiki rawsort

parameters.name: removenullvalues
parameters.description: Remove all Null values from json output. Useful for reducing json size. By default set to false. Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Example

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language field selector, displays data and fields in the selected language (default:'null' all languages are displayed)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to display, More fields are indicated by separator ',' example fields=Id,Active,Shortname (default:'null' all fields are displayed). Wiki fields

parameters.name: removenullvalues
parameters.description: Remove all Null values from json output. Useful for reducing json size. By default set to false. Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

get.summary: Converts the KML file from the supplied URL to GeoJSON.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to the KML file.

post.summary: Converts the KML provided as the body to GeoJSON.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The KML file content.

get.summary: Converts the GPX file from the supplied URL to GeoJSON.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to the GPX file.

post.summary: Converts the GPX provided as the body to GeoJSON.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The GPX file content.

get.summary: GET Detail Data in JSON LD Format (Schema.org Datatypes as output)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Data Type to transform currently available: ('accommodation', 'gastronomy', 'event', 'recipe', 'poi', 'region', 'tv', 'municipality', 'district', 'skiarea') required

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: ID of the data to transform, required

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Output Language, standard EN

parameters.name: idtoshow
parameters.description: ID to show on Json LD @id, not provided Id of ODH api call is taken

parameters.name: urltoshow
parameters.description: url to show on Json LD @id, not provided idtoshow is taken, idtoshow not provided url is filled with url of the data

parameters.name: imageurltoshow
parameters.description: image url to show on Json LD @image, not provided image url of data is taken

parameters.name: showid
parameters.description: Show the @id property in Json LD default value true

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language field selector, displays data and fields available in the selected language (default:'null' all languages are displayed)

parameters.name: idlist
parameters.description: IDFilter (Separator ',' List of IDs, 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Source Filter (possible Values: 'lts','idm'), (default:'null')

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to display, More fields are indicated by separator ',' example fields=Id,Active,Shortname (default:'null' all fields are displayed). Wiki fields

parameters.name: searchfilter
parameters.description: String to search for, Title in all languages are searched, (default: null) Wiki searchfilter

parameters.name: rawfilter
parameters.description: Wiki rawfilter

parameters.name: rawsort
parameters.description: Wiki rawsort

parameters.name: removenullvalues
parameters.description: Remove all Null values from json output. Useful for reducing json size. By default set to false. Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Publisher

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language field selector, displays data and fields available in the selected language (default:'null' all languages are displayed)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to display, More fields are indicated by separator ',' example fields=Id,Active,Shortname (default:'null' all fields are displayed). Wiki fields

parameters.name: removenullvalues
parameters.description: Remove all Null values from json output. Useful for reducing json size. By default set to false. Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Publisher Id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Publisher Id

parameters.name: idlist
parameters.description: IDFilter (Separator ',' List of IDs, 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: publisher Filter (Separator ',' List of IDs, 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: begindate
parameters.description: BeginDate of Events (Format: yyyy-MM-dd), (default: 'null')

parameters.name: enddate
parameters.description: EndDate of Events (Format: yyyy-MM-dd), (default: 'null')

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to display, More fields are indicated by separator ',' example fields=Id,Active,Shortname (default:'null' all fields are displayed). Wiki fields

parameters.name: rawfilter
parameters.description: Wiki rawfilter

parameters.name: rawsort
parameters.description: Wiki rawsort

parameters.name: removenullvalues
parameters.description: Remove all Null values from json output. Useful for reducing json size. By default set to false. Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the PushResponse

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to display, More fields are indicated by separator ',' example fields=Id,Active,Shortname (default:'null' all fields are displayed). Wiki fields

parameters.name: removenullvalues
parameters.description: Remove all Null values from json output. Useful for reducing json size. By default set to false. Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

parameters.description: Term to Search for Wiki

parameters.description: Restrict search to Entities (accommodation, odhactivitypoi, event, webcam, measuringpoint, ltsactivity, ltspoi, ltsgastronomy, article ..... )

parameters.name: searchbasetext
parameters.description: Search also trough base text (true/false), caution can slow down the search significantly

parameters.name: filteronfields
parameters.description: Search also on this fields, syntax analog to the fields filter
